ygData.subject: Re: LORE item looting change?
ygData.msgSnippet: Um lore item means you can only have one item at a time anyway. Naeeldar ... From: JasonF  To: Eqbards@Onelist.Com
ygData.messageBody:
Um lore item means you can only have one item at a time anyway.

Naeeldar

-----Original Message-----
From: JasonF <JasonF@...>
To: Eqbards@... <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Thursday, October 14, 1999 7:37 AM
Subject: [eqbards] LORE item looting change?


>From: "JasonF" <JasonF@...>
>
>
>On the subject of Lambent quest components, I noticed that the LORE items
>that I found last night in Cazic off of Alligators were not able to be
>looted PERIOD if you already had such an item in your inventory. In
>particular the Alligators were dropping a "Stein" and a "Shovel", both were
>ALL/ALL and had NO stat bonuses. Obviously quest items. They were
frequent
>drops too. After everyone in our group had a "Stein" and a "Shovel" we
>simply couldn't loot the alligators anymore and instead received messages
>saying something along the lines of 'You already have one such item in your
>inventory!'
>
>SO - If it is the case across the board that LORE items, once looted by an
>individual, cannot be looted (or even destroyed!) off of a mob by that same
>individual, you are going to see a LOT of free lore item calls from groups
>camping things like the Lizzy Fanatics in Cazic (mudwater runes).
>
>Again, my group left a trail of Alligators with Steins and Shovels on them
>because we COULDN'T loot or destroy these items.
>
>Has anyone else encountered this LORE item behavior?
>
>Crier Sharpsong - 26th song bard on Fennin Ro
>
>>Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to toren@...
with the subject lol.
>
